title: Collaborative Online International Learning (COIL) and Cultural Intelligence Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital collaboration tools and general understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: Performing practical tasks with learners from diverse cultural contexts in a VR simulation environment focused on international collaboration scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can improve cultural intelligence (CQ) to 4 points or higher on a 5-point Likert scale.
Learners can analyze how personality traits—such as openness, conscientiousness, and emotional stability—affect cultural intelligence during collaborative processes.
Learners can propose three or more conflict-resolution strategies with international team members in a VR simulation environment.

resources: BFI-2-XS (Big Five Inventory-2 Extra Short) Personality Assessment

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
